snippet.title: Lilo & Stitch: Trouble in Paradise Complete Gameplay (PlayStation,PS1,PSX)
snippet.description:
Lilo & Stitch: Trouble in Paradise (titled simply Disney's Lilo & Stitch on the American release of the PlayStation version) is an action-platform video game released on June 14, 2002. The game was developed by Blitz Games for PlayStation and Microsoft Windows, and published by Disney Interactive Studios.

Player: MfaRec
Platform: PlayStation
Release Date: June 14, 2002
